ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Type,"11"), $User.USER_ByPassRegleValidation__c = FALSE, NOT(ISPICKVAL( OPP_SousDomaine__c , "1")), NOT(ISPICKVAL( OPP_SousDomaine__c , "2")), NOT(ISPICKVAL( OPP_SousDomaine__c , "3")), NOT(ISPICKVAL( OPP_SousDomaine__c , "4")), NOT(ISPICKVAL( OPP_SousDomaine__c , "5")), NOT(ISPICKVAL( OPP_SousDomaine__c , "6")), NOT(ISPICKVAL( OPP_SousDomaine__c , "7")), NOT(ISPICKVAL( OPP_SousDomaine__c , "8")), NOT(ISPICKVAL( OPP_SousDomaine__c , "9")), NOT(ISPICKVAL( OPP_SousDomaine__c , "10")), NOT(ISPICKVAL( OPP_SousDomaine__c , "11")), NOT(ISPICKVAL( OPP_SousDomaine__c , "12")), NOT(ISPICKVAL( OPP_SousDomaine__c , "13")), NOT(ISPICKVAL( OPP_SousDomaine__c , "14")), NOT(ISPICKVAL( OPP_SousDomaine__c , "15")), NOT(ISPICKVAL( OPP_SousDomaine__c , "17")), NOT(ISPICKVAL( OPP_SousDomaine__c , "22")), NOT(ISPICKVAL( OPP_SousDomaine__c , "23")), NOT(ISPICKVAL( OPP_SousDomaine__c , "24")), NOT(ISPICKVAL( OPP_SousDomaine__c , "25")), NOT(ISPICKVAL( OPP_SousDomaine__c , "26")), NOT(ISPICKVAL( OPP_SousDomaine__c , "27")), NOT(ISPICKVAL( OPP_SousDomaine__c , "30")), NOT(ISPICKVAL( OPP_SousDomaine__c , "32")), NOT(ISPICKVAL( OPP_SousDomaine__c , "33")), NOT(ISPICKVAL( OPP_SousDomaine__c , "37")), NOT(ISPICKVAL( OPP_SousDomaine__c , "38")), NOT(ISPICKVAL( OPP_SousDomaine__c , "39")), NOT(ISPICKVAL( OPP_SousDomaine__c , "41")), NOT(ISPICKVAL( OPP_SousDomaine__c , "42")), NOT(ISPICKVAL( OPP_SousDomaine__c , "45")), NOT(ISPICKVAL( OPP_SousDomaine__c , "51")), NOT(ISPICKVAL( OPP_SousDomaine__c , "52")))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Attention, le Type de TVA ne peut pas être sélectionné pour ce Sous-domaine, merci de le corriger.
